気付いたら寝落ちしてた…

るしあにはずっと上を向いて笑ってて欲しい反面一緒に落ちる所まで落ちたいと思ってしまうのはおかしいですかね……

自己中ですいません

author: shiinarei
text:
Otsurushi! Glad to see that our beloved necromancer is better now after her previous stream but as you can tell her throat and cough were still acting up. Hopefully she gets better soon!

--
On a different note, there's a time and place for pettan/flat/cutting board/boing boing jokes and it's definitely not all the time. It's also not a really nice thing to say even if she doesn't say anything about it. Jokes without proper context are basically spam and it is not appreciated especially when the entire chat is filled with it. Getting her attention with all caps and saying "can you say this?" does not help either. She specified in this stream "Is boing boing the only thing that you know?". Do not disgrace all of the other foreigners that are enjoying the content just because of these few individuals.

The most important tool in the superchat is the report button. If you are feeling irritated by the spams, do not join them by saying "can you not spam?". Follow Hololive's instructions in the descriptions which is to ignore and report.

Instead of all the unnecessary spams, why not take the time to enjoy her content and listen to her beautiful voice? You might not understand but thankfully there are translators in the chat sometimes. You won't be able to see what they translated if the entire chat is filled with spams.

Be civilised, enjoy our beautiful Rushia and make her happy!
